messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] spanking no more
messages.msgSnippet: How courageous you are to say this and how wise you are to change. Janis ... From: kbcdlovejo@aol.com To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com Sent: Saturday,
messages.messageBody:
How courageous you are to say this and how wise you are to change.
Janis
----- Original Message -----
From: kbcdlovejo@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, April 12, 2003 12:49 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] spanking no more


In a message dated 4/12/2003 2:47:23 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
mjsolich@... writes:


> After reading all that has been posted last night I went to bed devastated.
> I suddenly saw the ugliness of it all and was so angry at my carelessness
> and at being a part of something so ignorant. I feel very emotional about
> it
> all but I guess that is good if it strengthens my resolve to treat my
> children with more respect.
>
> Thanks for opening my eyes. I feel humbled.
>

WOW!

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
